item.title: How Emotet Downloader Hides Its Payload
item.description: This week I came a cross a new version of Emotet. As I was trying to figure how the attack chain accures, I found this malicious excel document that is being used as a downloader of the sample. So I download the maldoc and run olevba to dump the macros, but nothing was found. Interesting.. Ok, Let’s find out what is going on. SHA1: 3fabbc9d0dbf064dbe1ca4ca8bed8324febc7ca9 Some Background Emotet is an advanced, self-propagating and modular Trojan That made its first appearance at 2014.
